comment.body: Yup it's the worst, vlc is fine. Personally I use Spotify

Banks have been playing with bitcoin for a while, it's an easy way for them to hide money.
The best for us is having a Bitcoin DebitCard that you only load with money to use it and have all your bitcoins on a physical wallet like https://bitcointrezor.com/
